metadata.name: Has spring come?
metadata.description:
Because of the delightful reds, yellows, blues and greens... 
Their tones and their splendid colors are dissolved in a cacophony woven harmony.  These colors resonate like music that expresses the mood of my soul.
It is a work that implies the various emotions and journeys of life.

As an unreleased work, it is the first work in a series of 'The gesture in life' that was produced on a low-spec computer in 1997.  It is a work reborn as an NFT art work in 2022.

1400x1050px
